MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. We appreciate you have now been without power for some time. Engineers are making progress with the repair on a pillar located outside 32 Winterhope Road and we still expect your power to be restored by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.42pm on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
